main.slogan: Grows Bitcoin safe & easy on the trustable investment platform
investmentIntro.title: Invest Bitcoin in 3 Steps
investmentIntro.step1.title: Buy & Store Bitcoin
investmentIntro.step1.content: You can now buy Bitcoin right on our platform using fiat currency, which uses services trusted by the best in blockchain. Otherwise, if you want to buy Bitcoin in other ways, watch our video and learn more details.
investmentIntro.step2.title: Build your Portfolio
investmentIntro.step2.content: Deposit to Bitcoin vault to grow your assets.
investmentIntro.step3.title: Earn Trustuble Yields
investmentIntro.step3.content: After the contract period ends, you can now receive your interest automatically. If you need to redeem your asset during the period, you may loss all the earning gain from this period but still receive your principal anytime, anywhere.
